courseDetails.title: Professional Scrum Master ™ ( PSM ™): 6 Prep Tests, 240 QAs
courseDetails.shortDescription: 6 practice Tests, 240 questions, explanations for Professional Scrum Master ™, PSM I™, PSM 1™ certification Tests
targetAudiences: This course is for anyone who want to assess their professional knowledge on Scrum or expand their knowledge on Scrum. Questions range from basic to expert level and explanations are given while reviewing the answers. Anyone associated with, planning to get involved in or interested in learning more about software development using Scrum can use this course. This will be useful for any Professional preparing for Scrum Master Certifications and interviews for Scrum roles.

Very Important Note: A subset of questions from the course “Be Agile with Scrum–Practice for Scrum Master Certifications” is given here. In other words, all questions in this course are present in the course “Be Agile with Scrum–Practice for Scrum Master Certifications”. The course “Be Agile with Scrum–Practice for Scrum Master Certifications” has 6 tests of 80 questions each. Many students found it to be too lengthy to complete. So, here we are coming up with a shorter version.
*Professional Scrum™, Professional Scrum Master™, PSM, PSM I, PSM 1, etc. is the protected brand of Scrum org.
